bold.ctarifaires: competitive pricing and favorable delivery conditions
bold.rationaliser: streamline their operations and enhance their efficiency
bold.une_seul: one offer, one package, and a simplified import process

content.paraph1: For more than two decades, Hold CD has established itself as a leading player in the supply of industrial equipment, raw materials, and spare parts for industrial companies worldwide.
content.paraph2: We have built an $vaste in the European and North American markets, which allows us to access $infos, as well as to offer $ctarifaires.
content.paraph3: Our clients choose to delegate part of their procurement process to Hold CD to $rationaliser. This results in :
content.li4: â€¦or a combination of these advantages.
content.paraph4: No matter where you are in the world, you simply need to send an email with the necessary references, and our experts will provide a comprehensive quote within 24 to 48 hours. All references, even those from different suppliers, will be integrated into a single process: $une_seul.

content.c1: One Point of Contact throughout the entire process, from your Request for Quotation to delivery.
content.c2: We are proficient in multiple languages for seamless communication.

content.c1: Prior to shipping, deliveries are meticulously inspected to prevent errors upon arrival.
content.c2: We ensure compliance with international regulations.

content.c1: Our extensive network of trusted suppliers guarantees competitive pricing and timely delivery.

card.resume: Let us assist you with the burdensome procurement tasks, freeing up your resources and efforts for activities that truly add value to your company.

howItWork.title: How it works ?
howItWork.video-title: To learn more, watch this 90-second explanatory video.

content.c1: Global Sourcing: HOLD CD specializes in procuring spare parts, equipment, and raw materials for various industries worldwide.
content.c2: Benefitting from longstanding relationships, HOLD CD provides the most favorable terms and conditions for pricing and delivery.
content.c3: HOLD CD excels in sourcing discontinued references and elusive parts that are challenging to find.
content.c4: With a dedicated process, HOLD CD can also ensure the safe delivery of hazardous materials.

content.c1: HOLD CD offers technical guidance to address challenges you encounter.
content.c2: We can suggest alternative references if needed.
content.c3: Upon request, we can provide solutions for delivery to your desired destination.

content.c1: Your materials are received at our warehouses.
content.c2: Every item undergoes thorough inspection before packaging to prevent errors upon delivery.
content.c3: You can track the progress of your order and request partial forwarding if necessary.

content.c1: All products sourced from various suppliers will be consolidated into a single box, most of the time recycled, offering both process simplification and a reduction in carbon footprint.
content.c2: A packing list, including your purchase order reference and item details, will be provided to facilitate your oversight.
content.c3: We can customize all documents to accommodate any special requests you may have.
content.c4: All shipping requirements will be met to streamline your customs procedures.

Industry.paraph1: At Hold CD, we provide complete MRO and industrial supply solutions designed for a variety of industries. From automotive and pharmaceuticals to textile and agriculture, our premium parts and services are tailored to meet the specific needs of each sector.
Industry.paraph2: Leveraging a vast network of partner suppliers, we guarantee prompt delivery, competitive pricing, and reliable service, helping clients maintain operational efficiency and concentrate on their core activities.
Industry.paraph3: If you do not see your industry listed, just contact us by a simple email - We can supply parts across all sectors.
